languages.text: "Коллектив может быть восполнен достойными разумами из числа обитателей "Герметико". В их мотивах и вере наличествует искренность. Им интуитивно ведомо понимание Прерывания Цикла. Отсутствие знаний и памяти ритуалов может быть компенсировано нашей коллективной памятью. Реставрация — возможна". {n}Паскаль... или то, что прежде звалось Паскалем, сотворяет священный жест, и зеленые искры пробегают по механической руке.{/n} "Но прежде должно быть вынесено Суждение".

"The Collective can be replenished with worthy minds from among those aboard the Hermetico. Sincerity is present in their motives and faith. They are intuitively capable of comprehending the notion of Discontinuing the Cycle. Our collective memory can compensate for their lack of knowledge and memory of the rites. Restoration is possible." {n}Pasqal — or what used to be known as Pasqal — makes a sacred gesture, and green sparks run down his mechanical arm.{/n} "But the Judgement must be passed first."
languages.original_text: "Коллектив может быть восполнен достойными разумами из числа обитателей "Герметико". В их мотивах и вере наличествует искренность. Им интуитивно ведомо понимание Прерывания Цикла. Отсутствие знаний и памяти ритуалов может быть компенсировано нашей коллективной памятью. Реставрация — возможна". {n}Паскаль... или то, что прежде звалось Паскалем, сотворяет священный жест, и зеленые искры пробегают по механической руке.{/n} "Но прежде должно быть вынесено Суждение".

Restoration is possible." {n}Pasqal — or what used to be known as Pasqal — makes a sacred gesture, and green sparks run down his mechanical arm.{/n} "But the Judgement must be passed first."

languages.text: 「集合体は、ヘルメティコに搭乗した者たちの中から立派な精神を持つもので満たすことができる。あの者たちの誠実さが、その動機と忠誠の中に存在しているのだ。サイクルを断ち切るという考えを本能的に理解できている。自分たちの集合メモリがあの者たちの知識不足と儀式の記憶を補うことができる。復旧は可能だ」{n}パスカル―あるいはパスカルとして知られていた何かは、神聖なジェスチャーをして、機械の腕から緑色の火花を発する。{/n}「しかし、まずはジャッジメントを通過しなくてはならぬ」
languages.original_text: "The Collective can be replenished with worthy minds from among those aboard the Hermetico. Sincerity is present in their motives and faith. They are intuitively capable of comprehending the notion of Discontinuing the Cycle. Our collective memory can compensate for their lack of knowledge and memory of the rites. Restoration is possible." {n}Pasqal — or what used to be known as Pasqal — makes a sacred gesture, and green sparks run down his mechanical arm.{/n} "But the Judgement must be passed first."

traits.locale_text: 「集合体は、ヘルメティコに搭乗した者たちの中から立派な精神を持つもので満たすことができる。あの者たちの誠実さが、その動機と忠誠の中に存在しているのだ。サイクルを断ち切るという考えを本能的に理解できている。自分たちの集合メモリがあの者たちの知識不足と儀式の記憶を補うことができる。復旧は可能だ」{n}パスカル―あるいはパスカルとして知られていた何かは、神聖なジェスチャーをして、機械の腕から緑色の火花を発する。{/n}「しかし、まずはジャッジメントを通過しなくてはならぬ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我们可以在隐士之舟号上选择有价值的人，以此对聚合意识进行补充。那些人的行动与信仰中充满了真诚，他们可以凭借直觉理解终止循环的概念，我们的聚合记忆也可以弥补他们对仪式知识与记忆的缺漏。因此，复原程序还是有可能实现的。”{n}帕斯卡，或者过去曾被称为帕斯卡的人，做了个神圣的手势，他的机械手臂流下了绿色的火花。{/n}“但在此之前，必须先做出判断。”
languages.original_text: "The Collective can be replenished with worthy minds from among those aboard the Hermetico. Sincerity is present in their motives and faith. They are intuitively capable of comprehending the notion of Discontinuing the Cycle. Our collective memory can compensate for their lack of knowledge and memory of the rites. Restoration is possible." {n}Pasqal — or what used to be known as Pasqal — makes a sacred gesture, and green sparks run down his mechanical arm.{/n} "But the Judgement must be passed first."

traits.locale_text: “我们可以在隐士之舟号上选择有价值的人，以此对聚合意识进行补充。那些人的行动与信仰中充满了真诚，他们可以凭借直觉理解终止循环的概念，我们的聚合记忆也可以弥补他们对仪式知识与记忆的缺漏。因此，复原程序还是有可能实现的。”{n}帕斯卡，或者过去曾被称为帕斯卡的人，做了个神圣的手势，他的机械手臂流下了绿色的火花。{/n}“但在此之前，必须先做出判断。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Le collectif pourra être complété avec les esprits de ceux qui sont déjà à bord de l'Hermetico et qui s'en montreront dignes. Nous avons décelé de la sincérité aussi bien dans leurs motivations que dans leur foi. L'Interruption du Cycle est une notion qu'ils comprennent de manière instinctive, et notre mémoire collective compensera leur ignorance des rites. La restauration est possible. » {n}Alors que Pasqal, ou tout du moins l'entité qui était connue sous le nom de Pasqal, exécute un geste rituel, des étincelles vertes viennent courir le long de son bras mécanique.{/n} « Mais d'abord, le jugement doit être rendu. »
languages.original_text: "The Collective can be replenished with worthy minds from among those aboard the Hermetico. Sincerity is present in their motives and faith. They are intuitively capable of comprehending the notion of Discontinuing the Cycle. Our collective memory can compensate for their lack of knowledge and memory of the rites. Restoration is possible." {n}Pasqal — or what used to be known as Pasqal — makes a sacred gesture, and green sparks run down his mechanical arm.{/n} "But the Judgement must be passed first."

traits.locale_text: « Le collectif pourra être complété avec les esprits de ceux qui sont déjà à bord de l'Hermetico et qui s'en montreront dignes. Nous avons décelé de la sincérité aussi bien dans leurs motivations que dans leur foi. L'interruption du Cycle est une notion qu'ils comprennent de manière instinctive, et notre mémoire collective compensera leur ignorance des rites. La restauration est possible. » {n}Alors que Pasqal, ou tout du moins l'entité qui était connue sous le nom de Pasqal, exécute un geste rituel, des étincelles vertes viennent courir le long de son bras mécanique.{/n} « Mais d'abord, le jugement doit être rendu. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Es posible incorporar nuevas mentes capaces de entre las que van a bordo del Hermético al Colectivo. Sus motivaciones y fe son sinceras. Son intuitivamente capaces de comprender la noción de interrumpir el Ciclo. Nuestra memoria colectiva puede compensar su falta de conocimiento y recuerdo de los ritos. Es posible realizar una Restauración». {n}Pasqal, o quien se solía llamar Pasqal, realiza un gesto sagrado y unos destellos verdes recorren su brazo mecánico de arriba a abajo.{/n} «Pero primero debe emitirse un Juicio».
languages.original_text: "The Collective can be replenished with worthy minds from among those aboard the Hermetico. Sincerity is present in their motives and faith. They are intuitively capable of comprehending the notion of Discontinuing the Cycle. Our collective memory can compensate for their lack of knowledge and memory of the rites. Restoration is possible." {n}Pasqal — or what used to be known as Pasqal — makes a sacred gesture, and green sparks run down his mechanical arm.{/n} "But the Judgement must be passed first."

traits.locale_text: «Es posible incorporar nuevas mentes capaces de entre las que van a bordo del Hermético al Colectivo. Sus motivaciones y fe son sinceras. Son intuitivamente capaces de comprender la noción de interrumpir el Ciclo. Nuestra memoria colectiva puede compensar su falta de conocimiento y recuerdo de los ritos. Es posible realizar una Restauración». {n}Pasqal, o quien se solía llamar Pasqal, realiza un gesto sagrado y unos destellos verdes recorren su brazo mecánico de arriba a abajo.{/n} «Pero primero debe emitirse un Juicio».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Das Kollektiv kann mit dem Geist würdiger Menschen an Bord der Hermetico aufgefüllt werden. Ehrlichkeit ist in ihren Motiven und ihrem Glauben zugegen. Sie sind intuitiv in der Lage, das Konzept der Unterbrechung des Zyklus zu verstehen. Unser kollektives Gedächtnis kann ihren Mangel an Wissen und an Erinnerung an die Riten kompensieren. Die Restoration ist möglich." {n}Pasqal — oder was einmal als Pasqal bekannt war — führt eine heilige Geste aus, und grüne Funken laufen an seinem mechanischen Arm entlang.{/n} "Doch zunächst muss das Urteil gefällt werden."
languages.original_text: "The Collective can be replenished with worthy minds from among those aboard the Hermetico. Sincerity is present in their motives and faith. They are intuitively capable of comprehending the notion of Discontinuing the Cycle. Our collective memory can compensate for their lack of knowledge and memory of the rites. Restoration is possible." {n}Pasqal — or what used to be known as Pasqal — makes a sacred gesture, and green sparks run down his mechanical arm.{/n} "But the Judgement must be passed first."

traits.locale_text: "Das Kollektiv kann mit dem Geist würdiger Menschen an Bord der Hermetico aufgefüllt werden. Ehrlichkeit ist in ihren Motiven und ihrem Glauben zugegen. Sie sind intuitiv in der Lage, das Konzept der Unterbrechung des Zyklus zu verstehen. Unser kollektives Gedächtnis kann ihren Mangel an Wissen und an Erinnerung an die Riten kompensieren. Die Restoration ist möglich." {n}Pasqal — oder was einmal als Pasqal bekannt war — führt eine heilige Geste aus, und grüne Funken laufen an seinem mechanischen Arm entlang.{/n} "Doch zunächst muss das Urteil gefällt werden."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bütünlük, Hermetico'da bulunan değerli zihinlerle yenilenebilir. Amaçlarına ve inançlarına samimiyet hâkim. Döngü Süreğininin Bozulumu fikrini kavramaya sezgisel olarak muktedirler. Müşterek hafızamız, ayin bilgisi ve belleği eksikliklerini telafi edebilir. Yeniden Yapılanma mümkün." {n}Pasqal veya eskiden Pasqal olan şey, dinî bir el hareketi yapıyor. Sonrasında mekanik kolunda yeşil kıvılcımlar çakılıyor.{/n} "Ancak öncelikle Hüküm verilmeli."
languages.original_text: "The Collective can be replenished with worthy minds from among those aboard the Hermetico. Sincerity is present in their motives and faith. They are intuitively capable of comprehending the notion of Discontinuing the Cycle. Our collective memory can compensate for their lack of knowledge and memory of the rites. Restoration is possible." {n}Pasqal — or what used to be known as Pasqal — makes a sacred gesture, and green sparks run down his mechanical arm.{/n} "But the Judgement must be passed first."

traits.locale_text: "Bütünlük, Hermetico'da bulunan değerli zihinlerle yenilenebilir. Amaçlarına ve inançlarına samimiyet hâkim. Döngü'nün süreğini bozma fikrini algılamaya içgüdüsel olarak muktedirler. Kolektif hafızamız, onların hafıza ve ayin bilgisi eksikliğini kompanse edebilir. Yeniden Yapılanma mümkün." {n}Pasqal, veya eskiden Pasqal olan şey, dinî bir el hareketi yapıyor ve mekanik kolundan yeşil kıvılcımlar çıkmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ama öncelikle Hüküm verilmeli."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
